data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Cuddalore, Tamil Nadu, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cuddalore, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Cuddalore. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Cuddalore are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, help the people of Cuddalore, Tamil Nadu, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, I pray that the Mukkuvan (Hindu traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 28,665 believers in Cuddalore, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Cuddalore, Tamil Nadu, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the county of Cuddalore, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 2,605,900.

We estimate Cuddalore has 28,665 people who might know Jesus, 31,618 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,545,617 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Cuddalore, Tamil Nadu, India.
